Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Harrison, Damen, Jackson and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Van Buren, Damen, Harrison and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Division
ShortDescription: #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to fire department activity near Central/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Division, Austin, North Ave., and Central, over normal route, due to fire department activity near Central/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Harrison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Harrison.

Northbound buses will operate via Clark, Harrison, Dearborn, and over normal route.

Southbound buses will take layover on Clark at Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Harrison
ShortDescription: Southbound #24 Wentworth buses are temp. rerouted via Clark, Harrison, State, Polk, Clark, over normal route, due to a street blockage near Clark/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Harrison, State, Polk, Clark, and resume normal route, due to a street blockage near Clark/Harrison. 

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
